definition: young, cute boy/derived from Japanese loanword shotacon 正太控[zheng4 tai4 kong4]
first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
shotacon (Japanese loanword)/manga or anime genre depicting young boys in an erotic manner

sentences.english: One of them had a little boy and a frog.
sentences.chinese: 其中一個有一隻青蛙和一個小正太。

sentences.english: Hi, I am from China is too small, you have nothing to ask it?
sentences.chinese: 嗨，我是來自中國的小正太，你們有什麼要問的嗎？

sentences.english: Being an oversea saler in Yangzhou Zhengtai Tourism Products Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 現在寧德正太旅遊用品有限公司從事外貿業務。

sentences.english: Content:The shijiazhuang-taiyuan line is the first state-owned narrow-gauge railway in China.
sentences.chinese: 正太鐵路是中國第一條國有窄軌鐵路。

sentences.english: A bright 10-year-old can understand most Hollywood films.
sentences.chinese: 十歲的小正太可以看懂大部分好萊塢電影。

definition: shotacon (Japanese loanword)/manga or anime genre depicting young boys in an erotic manner
queer uncle, referring to a young to middle-aged male pedophile (Internet slang)
